list.en: I didn't like city life.
list.cn: 我不喜欢城市生活。

list.en: I didn't like city life.
list.cn: 我不喜欢城市生活。

list.en: I find living in the city quite stressful.
list.cn: 我觉得住在城市里压力很大。

list.en: We must debate the noise in our big cities.
list.cn: 我们必须讨论大城市的噪音问题。

list.en: The convenience of city life is one of its main attractions.
list.cn: 城市生活的便利是它的主要吸引力之一。

list.en: The pace of city life is too fast.
list.cn: 城市生活的节奏太快了。

list.en: The quality of city life has been damaged by excessive noise.
list.cn: 城市生活的质量已被过度的噪音所破坏。

list.en: There are a lot of large supermarkets in the city.
list.cn: 这个城市有很多大型超市。

list.en: This is a modern city.
list.cn: 这是一个现代化的城市。

list.en: This city is far too polluted.
list.cn: 这个城市污染太严重了。

list.en: In general, urban populations are better off than their rural counterparts.
list.cn: 一般来说，城市人口比农村人口富裕。

list.en: There are many people in the city.
list.cn: 这个城市有很多人。

list.en: Life in this city is more stressful.
list.cn: 这个城市的生活压力更大。

list.en: People in rural areas long for life in the city.
list.cn: 农村的人渴望在城市生活。

list.en: He was dazzled by the gaiety and splendor of the metropolis.
list.cn: 大都市的欢乐与辉煌使他眼花缭乱。

list.en: I'd like to live in a village.
list.cn: 我想住在村庄里。

list.en: He told me he preferred the country life to the city life.
list.cn: 他告诉我他喜欢乡村生活而不喜欢城市生活。

list.en: Some people are attracted by the beauty of the country.
list.cn: 有些人被这个国家的美景所吸引。

list.en: The village was defended by a river.
list.cn: 这个村庄被一条河保护着。

list.en: The sun beamed down upon the peaceful village.
list.cn: 太阳照耀着宁静的村庄。

list.en: I do hope for change in a quiet village.
list.cn: 我真希望这个安静的村庄能有所改变。

list.en: I found that life in a remote village was very serene.
list.cn: 我发现偏远村庄的生活很宁静。

list.en: That's our orchard.
list.cn: 那是我们的果园。

list.en: We grow our own vegetables in the garden.
list.cn: 我们在花园里自己种蔬菜。

list.en: She always works in the field.
list.cn: 她总是在地里干活。

list.en: Your rooms are more vacant than the rooms in the city.
list.cn: 你的房间比城里的房间都空。

list.en: You can get sunlight and fresh air in the country.
list.cn: 在乡下你可以得到阳光和新鲜空气。

list.en: There was only one school in the small village.
list.cn: 这个小村庄只有一所学校。

list.en: I'm tired of the city and long for the woods and the country.
list.cn: 我厌倦了城市，渴望森林和乡村。

list.en: Are there any vacant rooms in this building?
list.cn: 这幢楼里还有空房吗?

list.en: How much is the rent?
list.cn: 租金是多少?

list.en: How much is the deposit?
list.cn: 押金是多少?

list.en: Is it furnished?
list.cn: 有家具吗?

list.en: Are you the landlord?
list.cn: 你是房东吗?

list.en: Are there any apartments to let?
list.cn: 有没有公寓要出租?

list.en: May I take a look around this apartment?
list.cn: 我可以参观一下这个公寓吗?

list.en: How many rooms are there in this apartment?
list.cn: 这套公寓有多少个房间?

list.en: How long do you want to rent the house?
list.cn: 你想租多久?

list.en: When can I move in here?
list.cn: 我什么时候能搬进来?

list.en: I'd like a rather quiet room on the sunny side, if possible.
list.cn: 如果可能的话，我想要一间向阳的比较安静的房间。

list.en: Is the property well lighted?
list.cn: 这房子采光好吗?

list.en: Excuse me, what kinds of apartments do you have for renting?
list.cn: 请问，你们有什么样的公寓要出租?

list.en: You have your deposit one month rent in advance.
list.cn: 你预付了一个月的房租。

list.en: The house is fully furnished.
list.cn: 这房子家具齐全。

list.en: Are the utilities included in the rent?
list.cn: 水电费包括在房租里吗?

list.en: Do you want roommates or to live alone?
list.cn: 你想要室友还是一个人住?

list.en: What kind of apartment do you prefer?
list.cn: 你喜欢什么样的公寓?

list.en: Do you think we can afford the mortgage?
list.cn: 你认为我们付得起抵押贷款吗?

list.en: What kinds of apartments do you have for sale?
list.cn: 你们有什么类型的公寓出售?

list.en: The real estate is always on the rise.
list.cn: 房地产总是在上涨。

list.en: I want to buy a house on mortgage.
list.cn: 我想抵押买一套房子。

list.en: You can get a loan from the bank and you only need the down payment.
list.cn: 你可以向银行贷款，只需要付首付款。

list.en: I'm satisfied with the apartment.
list.cn: 我对这套公寓很满意。

list.en: I'd like the house and I'll buy it.
list.cn: 我喜欢这房子，我会买下它。

list.en: The price of the houses has risen a lot in the past years.
list.cn: 在过去的几年里，房价上涨了很多。

list.en: It will take us twenty years to pay off all the money.
list.cn: 我们要花20年才能还清所有的钱。

list.en: It should be just three bedrooms.
list.cn: 应该只有三间卧室。

list.en: I would like an apartment by the sea.
list.cn: 我想要一套临海的公寓。

list.en: What about painting the hall white?
list.cn: 把大厅漆成白色怎么样?

list.en: My house needed painting.
list.cn: 我的房子需要油漆了。

list.en: Our house needs patching.
list.cn: 我们的房子需要修补。

list.en: The heating system has to be installed.
list.cn: 必须安装供暖系统。

list.en: We may hang some pictures on the wall.
list.cn: 我们可以在墙上挂一些画。

list.en: The paint is going to come off.
list.cn: 油漆要掉了。

list.en: I am going to fix up the top of the house.
list.cn: 我打算修理房子的屋顶。

list.en: My sitting room is decorated perfectly.
list.cn: 我的客厅装修得很完美。

list.en: We must have it painted in two months.
list.cn: 我们必须在两个月内把它漆好。

list.en: We should paint the wall wider so that it looks brighter.
list.cn: 我们应该把墙刷宽一些，这样看起来更亮。

list.en: I'd like to paint the living room pink.
list.cn: 我想把客厅漆成粉红色。

list.en: We should paint the bathroom white.
list.cn: 我们应该把浴室漆成白色。

list.en: I'd like to have my new house decorated.
list.cn: 我想把我的新房子装饰一下。

list.en: How do you want to decorate your house?
list.cn: 你想怎样装饰你的房子?

list.en: When will you start?
list.cn: 你什么时候出发?

list.en: I think a lot of the material when decorating.
list.cn: 我在装修时考虑了很多材料。

list.en: I've been fixing the house.
list.cn: 我一直在修理房子。

list.en: Have you decided how you're going to decorate your room?
list.cn: 你决定怎么装饰你的房间了吗?

list.en: I retained the original exterior wall while decorating the house.
list.cn: 我在装修房子的时候保留了原来的外墙。

list.en: The decoration company can do everything for you.
list.cn: 装修公司可以为您做一切。

list.en: I have no idea about decoration.
list.cn: 我对装修一窍不通。

list.en: It's very large and bright.
list.cn: 它又大又亮。

list.en: Large Windows may help air in and out.
list.cn: 大窗户有助于空气进出。

list.en: Could you help us with moving on sunday?
list.cn: 星期天你能帮我们搬家吗?

list.en: When will you move?
list.cn: 你什么时候搬家?

list.en: How many things do you have?
list.cn: 你有多少东西?

list.en: I promised to help my sister move her house this weekend.
list.cn: 我答应这个周末帮我妹妹搬家。

list.en: Have you moved into your new house yet?
list.cn: 你搬进新居了吗?

list.en: We just moved in yesterday, actually.
list.cn: 事实上，我们昨天才搬进来。

list.en: Have you thought of moving at all?
list.cn: 你想过搬家吗?

list.en: How is your new house going?
list.cn: 你的新房子怎么样?

list.en: Your new house is very comfortable.
list.cn: 你的新房子很舒服。

list.en: I'm anxious to get into the new place.
list.cn: 我急于想搬进新地方。

list.en: Congratulations on your move.
list.cn: 恭喜你搬家。

list.en: Could you tell me the shape of the car?
list.cn: 你能告诉我这辆车的形状吗?

list.en: How much do you want for the car?
list.cn: 这辆车你想卖多少钱?

list.en: Where can I find a good deal on a vehicle?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以买到便宜的车?

list.en: What kind of car is safe?
list.cn: 什么样的车是安全的?

list.en: Why not try this car?
list.cn: 为什么不试试这辆车呢?

list.en: What's the safest car out there?
list.cn: 最安全的车是什么?

list.en: Is 10,000 dollars a good price for a car?
list.cn: 1万美元买一辆车合适吗?

list.en: What are the miles per gallon like on this car?
list.cn: 这辆车每加仑汽油能跑多少英里?

list.en: Do you know how far this car runs per gallon?
list.cn: 你知道这辆车每加仑汽油能跑多远吗?

list.en: Will you offer any discount right now?
list.cn: 你们现在有折扣吗?

list.en: Could you tell me more about its standard features?
list.cn: 你能告诉我更多关于它的标准功能吗?

list.en: We can't afford this one.
list.cn: 我们买不起这个。

list.en: What style furniture do you have?
list.cn: 你有什么式样的家具?

list.en: What kind of furniture do you like?
list.cn: 你喜欢什么样的家具?

list.en: Can you show me how it works, please?
list.cn: 你能告诉我怎么用吗?

list.en: I must buy some furniture.
list.cn: 我必须买些家具。

list.en: The refrigerator matches the cabinets.
list.cn: 冰箱和橱柜很相配。

list.en: I want to buy a microwave oven.
list.cn: 我想买一台微波炉。

list.en: It's really easy and simple to operate.
list.cn: 它真的很容易操作。

list.en: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
list.cn: 我的冰箱昨天突然坏了。

list.en: Why don't you choose a bunk bed for your children?
list.cn: 你为什么不给你的孩子选一张双层床呢?

list.en: You should simplify your closet.
list.cn: 你应该简化你的衣橱。

list.en: I have a large wardrobe.
list.cn: 我有一个大衣柜。

list.en: We need a washing machine.
list.cn: 我们需要一台洗衣机。
